name: tldr-extension-browser
description: Collaborative cheatsheets for console commands (tldr project) now in your Browser!

scripts.process-styles: npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 styles/main.scss styles/main.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 styles/popup.scss styles/popup.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --format breaksWith=lf --output styles/main.min.css styles/main.css && cleancss --format breaksWith=lf --output styles/popup.min.css styles/popup.css
scripts.js-minify: uglifyjs main.js -o main.js && uglifyjs background.js -o background.js

author: Raúl Piracés
